alert.note: Alert for Fulton; Henry; Williams (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Allen, southeastern De Kalb, southeastern Hillsdale, northeastern Putnam, Defiance, northern Paulding, Henry, Williams and Fulton Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 714 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Clayton to near Hicksville. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Defiance, Napoleon, Bryan, Wauseon, Archbold, Montpelier, Swanton, Hicksville, Delta, Hudson, Edgerton, Deshler, West Unity, Pioneer, Stryker, Fayette, Liberty Center, Holgate, Mcclure and St. Joe. This includes Interstate 80 in Ohio between mile markers 9 and 48. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for southeastern Michigan. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch also remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for northeastern Indiana...and northwestern and west central Ohio.
